entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baie-Saint-Paul
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
